exceptions.exn: In environment d : preDTA H : dta_correct d Unable to unify "dta_correct d" with "dta_correct (udta_conv_1 d)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall d : preDTA, dta_correct d -> dta_correct (udta_conv_1 d)

Premises:
preDTA = Map state : Set
dta_correct = fun d : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> Prop
udta_conv_1 = fun d : preDTA => M2 state (M0 state) (udta_conv_1_aux d) : preDTA -> preDTA
udta_conv_0_compat : forall d : preDTA, dta_correct d -> dta_correct (udta_conv_0 d)
u_conv_1_ref_ok : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d -> preDTA_ref_ok (udta_conv_1 d)
u_merge_2_2 : forall d : preDTA, u_merge_inv_0_lst d prec_empty tnil (rec_empty d)
new_state_insd_2 : forall d : preDTA, new_state_insd_def_lst d prec_empty tnil (rec_empty d)
u_conv1_2r : forall d : preDTA, u_conv_lr_1_r d prec_empty tnil (rec_empty d)
u_merge_4_2 : forall d : preDTA, u_merge_invr_0_lst d prec_empty tnil (rec_empty d)
u_conv1_2 : forall d : preDTA, u_conv_lr_1 d prec_empty tnil (rec_empty d)
u_merge_3_2 : forall d : preDTA, u_merge_inv_1_lst d prec_empty tnil (rec_empty d)
u_merge_5_2 : forall d : preDTA, u_merge_invr_1_lst d prec_empty tnil (rec_empty d)
u_conv_1_invar_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> MapGet state (udta_conv_1 d) (uad_conv_1 a) = Some (umpl_conv_1 ladj)
u_conv_1_invar_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_1 d) (uad_conv_1 a) = Some (umpl_conv_1 ladj) -> MapGet state d a = Some ladj
u_conv_1_invar_4 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_1 d) (uad_conv_1 a) = Some ladj -> exists ladj0 : state, ladj = umpl_conv_1 ladj0
u_conv_1_invar_5 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_1 d) (uad_conv_1 a) = Some ladj -> exists ladj0 : state, ladj = umpl_conv_1 ladj0 /\ MapGet state d a = Some ladj0
predta_compatible_compat : forall d0 d1 : preDTA, predta_compatible d0 d1 -> dta_compat d0 d1
pl_tl_length_rec_1 : forall d : preDTA, pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 d prec_empty tnil
rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil
u_conv1_r : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance (udta_conv_1 p) (uad_conv_1 a) t -> reconnaissance p a t
u_conv1 : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> reconnaissance (udta_conv_1 p) (uad_conv_1 a) t
predta_compatible_compat_def = fun d0 : preDTA => forall d1 : preDTA, predta_compatible d0 d1 -> dta_compat d0 d1 : preDTA -> Prop
u_merge_1r : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (u_merge p0 p1) a = Some s -> forall b : ad, a = uad_conv_1 b -> MapGet state (udta_conv_1 p1) a = Some s
u_conv_1_invar_8 : forall (p0 : preDTA) (a0 : ad) (s0 : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_1 p0) a0 = Some s0 -> exists a1 : ad, a0 = uad_conv_1 a1
u_conv_0_invar_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_0 d) (uad_conv_0 a) = Some (umpl_conv_0 ladj) -> MapGet state d a = Some ladj
u_conv_disj : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_0 p0) a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state (udta_conv_1 p1) a1 = Some s1 -> a0 <> a1
u_merge_1 : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_1 p1) a = Some s -> MapGet state (u_merge p0 p1) a = Some s
insert_main_state = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) => insert_main_state_0 d (new_preDTA_ad d) s : preDTA -> state -> DTA
u_merge = fun p0 p1 : preDTA => MapMerge state (udta_conv_0 p0) (udta_conv_1 p1) : preDTA -> preDTA -> preDTA
udta_conv_0 = fun d : preDTA => M2 state (udta_conv_0_aux d) (M0 state) : preDTA -> preDTA
liste_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d prec_empty tnil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> P d la tl -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> P p p0 t
u_conv_0_invar_4 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_0 d) (uad_conv_0 a) = Some ladj -> exists ladj0 : state, ladj = umpl_conv_0 ladj0
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
u_conv_0_invar_5 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_0 d) (uad_conv_0 a) = Some ladj -> exists ladj0 : state, ladj = umpl_conv_0 ladj0 /\ MapGet state d a = Some ladj0
DTA_rect : forall P : DTA -> Type, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
mlrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list) (l : liste_reconnait p p0 t), P1 p p0 t l
mreconnaissance_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), P p a t r
prec_list_ref_ok_check = fix prec_list_ref_ok_check (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA) {struct p} : bool := match p with | prec_cons a la ls => addr_in_dta_check d a && (prec_list_ref_ok_check la d && prec_list_ref_ok_check ls d) | prec_empty => true end : prec_list -> preDTA -> bool
predtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : preDTA), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> predta_compatible d d'
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
prec_list_ind : forall P : prec_list -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
new_state_ins_r : forall (d0 : preDTA) (a0 : ad) (t0 : term) (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), reconnaissance d0 a0 t0 -> preDTA_ref_ok d -> d0 = MapPut state d a s -> MapGet state d a = None -> a <> a0 -> reconnaissance d a0 t0
rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t
